name: Spider of Leng
description: The Spider of Leng is a large aberration characterized by its chaotic evil nature. It possesses a formidable appearance with powerful attacks and a magical presence.
memorable: Its ability to combine physical attacks with powerful spells, plus its poisonous blood effects, make it a unique threat.
goals: To dominate its territory and eliminate threats through a combination of physical and magical assaults.
relations: Can possibly be encountered with other aberrations or as a servant to dark beings.
environment: Usually found in dark and chaotic places or lairs of evil creatures.
strengths: Highly adaptable due to its intelligent spellcasting and potent poisonous attacks.
weaknesses: Slow mobility limits its engagement options in combat.
attacks: Utilizes claw attacks for slashing and poison damage and the Staff of Leng for stunning blows, as well as ranged spit venom attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Eldritch Understanding allows it to utilize any spell scroll or magic item without restriction.
senses: It has darkvision up to 240 feet, allowing it to see in complete darkness.
skills: Proficient in Stealth (+6) and capable of moving unseen.
additional_information: Immune to poison and specific conditions.
Can create a toxic cloud upon death that damages nearby creatures.
Can cast spells without material components, enhancing its versatility.
Uses Poisonous Riposte to retaliate against melee attackers.
Tactically utilizes its spells like confusion and silence in combat.
spellcasting: Casts spells like comprehend languages, detect magic, confusion, silence, arcane eye, and hypnotic pattern, utilizing Intelligence for spellcasting.
test_queries: large spider that uses poison and magic
chaotic evil aberration with poisonous blood
spider that can cast confusion and silence
dangerous magical spider in dark lairs
venomous creature with area poison effects
